thread.title: BRIEF-Cornerstone OnDemand Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.16

title: BRIEF-Cornerstone OnDemand Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.16
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Cornerstone Ondemand Inc:
* CORNERSTONE ONDEMAND ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.19
* Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.16 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 21 PERCENT TO $132 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $497 MILLION TO $507 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $126 MILLION TO $128 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.21, REVENUE VIEW $133.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 REVENUE VIEW $122.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $505.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
